organisation net: 
fdf8:1111:1111:000x:0000:0000:0000:0000/60
x - net
16 /64 nets

r3:
 f0: ipv6 address fdf8:1111:1111:0008:0000:0000:0000:0001/64

r7:

 f0: ipv6 address fdf8:1111:1111:0002:0000:0000:0000:0001/64
 e1: ip address 10.0.0.2 255.255.255.0
 tunnel0: ipv6 address fdf8:1111:1111:0010:0000:0000:0000:0001/64
